results.definition: the amount that can be contained
examples: the gas tank has a capacity of 12 gallons

results.definition: an electrical phenomenon whereby an electric charge is stored
the susceptibility of something to a particular treatment
the power to learn or retain knowledge; in law, the ability to understand the facts and significance of your behavior

examples: he was employed in the capacity of director
he should be retained in his present capacity at a higher salary
among his gifts is his capacity for true altruism

results.definition: (computer science) the amount of information (in bytes) that can be stored on a disk drive
examples: the capacity of a hard disk drive is usually expressed in megabytes
the plant is working at 80 per cent capacity
he had drunk beyond his capacity
